ygData.subject: Toko Binlittle
ygData.msgSnippet: Toko Binlittle is one of the pirates at that island in OOT. He have only dropped a pirate earring each time I have killed him. You arent losing any faction
ygData.messageBody:
Toko Binlittle is one of the pirates at that island in
OOT. He have only dropped a pirate earring each time I
have killed him. You arent losing any faction with
AkAnon either, actually killing these pirates gives
some nice factions with "good" people around Norrath.
Gornit, the giant at their side, will not trouble you
either, as long as you keep a watchful eye on him
while you pull (it may pay off to keep an eye on
cyclopes too). He regularilly wanders from the waters
edge, to the pirate camp, and back, but can easily be
timed. I was doing this with a lvl 20ish group, to get
the Bracer of Errolisi, that drops from the pirate
captain. Anyway, my point is I doubt it drops from
him, but it even if I think so, it could still be a
rare drop, I havent killed him that many times.

Captain Piip Ignatz
http://www.geocities.com/SoHo/Lofts/4125/pirates.html
Innoruuk
